EmailTemplate.description: Used when Dealer is unresponsive to Roof Leak service requests
EmailTemplate.name: SR Cancellation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Request Cancellation - {!Case.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Partner_Name__c},
Please disregard the work order we sent to ( email address where notification was sent ) last ( date and time notification sent).
We have reassigned to one of our third party contractors to visit the site to assess the ( issue ) reported by the homeowner.
Please do not contact the customer regarding the ( concern ) as we did not receive any acknowledgement on the email we sent last (date). Per initial email, we will need to contact the HO at least 24 hours from the time the request was received. Please also note that SunPower will not compensate any repairs made on the customers system due to non-acknowledgement.
For further assistance, please respond to this email or call 1-800-SUNPOWER and we will be happy to assist you.
Sincerely,
Your SunPower Customer Care Department
